Articles.Content:
It seems my Woomerang dish vanishes for no reason.

In the past, I traced this to issues to Modular Flight Integrator.  However, in the current build, I had Modular Flight Integrator installed (a requirement of Kopernicus, which in turn is a requirement for Stock Terrain Enhancements) and at first the dish appeared.  I tested out the mission (which is a challenge I am developing that includes driving a rover to the dish) and initially I had no problems.  Then, returning to Woomerang, I noticed the dish had disappeared.

 

Figuring MFI might still be the culprit, I uninstalled ALL my mods and reopened KSP. No luck.  So I thought maybe that save was corrupted, and I created a new save. After placing various craft around Kerbin, including at Woomerang for the same challenge, again I found nfo dish, even without any mods.

 

So, I opened ANOTHER test, and placed just one rocket at Woomerang. Voila, the dish reappeared.  Any ideas?

 

Test with dish appearing

No dish

 

Dish appears with all mods installed (later vanished in same save).
